item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:1, topic:240023”]hey in my npc handler. i added this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2170) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to nick!"; }

and it worked n i got no errors.
but when i try to add these under it i get errors;

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3564) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "slayer here!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 3548) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "medium - high!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 3572) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "low - medium!"; }

heres what my errors say

NPCHandler.java:2967: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2967: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2967: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2992: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 7 errors[/quote]

neva had this problem, try spreading them out,??

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!

item.description:

hey in my npc handler. i added this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2170) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to nick!"; }

heres what my errors say

NPCHandler.java:2967: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2967: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2967: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2980: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2992: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 7 errors
